Comments_List: a broad overview of Islamic history and Islamic theological vocab.

Professor Griffel is a great lecturer and the sections are very helpful. It would have been nice if there was some additional, smaller form of graded assignment (maybe the final paper could be split into two smaller papers, not necessarily due at finals).
very well-organized, but the final assignments were a little bit too much with both paper and final.
Yes, I would recommend the course to anyone who wants to get a solid foundation in mainstream Islamic intellectual history.
Yes. Professor Griffel is a very good lecturer.
